column1: English Sent: The movement of the plates results in the building up of stresses within the plates and the continental rocks above
Hindi Tansl: pletoM kI_gawi_ke_kAraNa pletoM ke aMxara evaM Upara kI ora sWiwa mahAxvIpIya SEloM meM xabAva uwpanna howA hE; isake pariNAmasvarUpa valana
column2: BraMSIkaraNa waWA jvAlAmuKIya kriyAez howI hEM.

column1: Anu Translation:  imArawa meM pAnI caD pariNAmoM kI gawiviXi waha kara bijlI banxa ho Ora jvAlAmuKIya kriyA kalApa ke pariNAmasvarUpa ke Upara isa pleta Ora mahAxvIpIya cattAnoM meM Upara kI ora kA bala xewI hE
